mapper.select: select sigTimestamp from signatureDayLog where userId=#{userId} and month=#{month} order by sigTimestamp desc

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from signatureDayLog where userId=#{userId} and sigTimestamp=#{sigTimestamp}
insert.if: insert into signatureDayLog(userId, sigTimestamp, month) values(#{userId}, #{sigTimestamp}, #{month})
